Class Tree

  • public class Tree
extends java.lang.Object
    The Tree class represents a multi-way tree

      • beginSession

        public void beginSession(java.lang.String parentInfo)
        Initiates ordering service. Starting from the root of the tree, it prompts users for inputs; chooses the branch of the tree that the user is interested in. Prints the order and the price when a leaf is reached.
        Parameters:
        parentInfo -
